feed.title: Sault Ste. Marie - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Sault Ste. Marie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:19 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -2.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 8:00 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -2.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -5.8°C
Wind: WNW 32 km/h gust 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming east 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
